name: Shutter (itch) (BenCourtemanche)
description:
Shutter was made in my second year for Sheridan College's Design Week with Sydney Davio, Ben Dryburgh, Todd Brooks-Marling, Kitty Chen and Camden Malowany. We were given the task of creating an alterative controller game in 4 days.

Keybinds: "F" to flash, "P" to open menu
